meanings.definition: In a remarkable or outstanding manner
meanings.sent1: She performed phenomenally well in the school play.
meanings.sent2: The athlete ran phenomenally fast in the race.
meanings.sent3: The magician's disappearing act was phenomenally entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The news of the surprise party spread phenomenally quickly.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was phenomenally beautiful.

meanings.definition: To a very great or impressive degree
meanings.sent1: The students phenomenally improved their grades after studying hard.
meanings.sent2: The chef phenomenally cooked a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The cat phenomenally chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden phenomenally bloomed after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The rocket launch was phenomenally successful.
